name: Darling of the Sea
description:
🌊 My lover, who died a year ago has resurrected and returned. But...

🌊  Darling of the Sea is a short romance thriller game about the protagonist, Ivy Blue, who wished on a shooting star on her lover's death anniversary; and her resurrected lover. There are slight horror elements and 4 endings in this game.

🌊 I made DotS for the fourth 'One Map One Chicken' Jam on January 31st.  You can enjoy other games submitted to the jam(KOR) here: https://1map1chicken.com/

🌊  The English translation was done by Solarane !
